main event: A witness observed a solid spherical red object with a green tail flying in the sky for 3-5 seconds in Herkimer, New York on August 5, 1951.
interesting points: The object flickered and had a length 2-3 times its width,The object was reported to have a constant intensity with a fuzzy or blurred outline,The object moved in a straight and level flight path,Disappeared behind trees after a 60-degree arc of movement,The reporting witness speculated it might be a meteor but noted its low altitude and steady flight.
sighted object: spherical red object with a green tail
witness description: A civilian; age 46, tool and diemaker (aircraft) with some technical training and flight instruction experience.
